titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Bellingham Chamber of Commerce records 1890-1992
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Rozlind Koester

publicationstmt.publisher: Western Washington University, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Rozlind Koester 2011.
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS ( Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

did.abstract: The Bellingham Chamber of Commerce records include clippings, committee files, and memorabilia from Chamber-sponsored events.

scopecontent.p: The Bellingham Chamber of Commerce records include membership registers, clippings, committee files and memorabilia from activities sponsored by the organization. The Chamber sponsored numerous local events including Blossomtime parades and Jaycee Week, as well as state-wide events and conferences throughout Washington State.

accessrestrict.p: Some restrictions apply - contact repository for details.

prefercite.p: Bellingham Chamber of Commerce records, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies, Western Libraries Archives & Special Collections, Western Washington University, Bellingham WA 98225-9123.

acqinfo.p: Donated in multiple installments by various representatives of the Bellingham Chamber of Commerce. The first donation was made in 1980 and the last in 1996.

relatedmaterial.p: The Bellingham Chamber of Commerce photographs may contain related material.

processinfo.head: About Harmful Language and Content
